liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

emoteList.value: HSWP, TwitchRPG, MorphinTime, duDudu, HumbleLife, PJSalt
emoteList.label: List of used Emotes
emoteList.tooltip: List of the Emotes you want to use. Seperate them per Comma. More Emotes = Less Chance

superEmote.label: Set the Super Jackpot Emote
superEmote.tooltip: Emote that triggers the Super Jackpot when 3 of them.

costs.label: Cost to play the game
costs.tooltip: Set the cost for this command.

rewardTwoSeperated.label: Reward multiplier - Two Emotes (Seperated)
rewardTwoSeperated.tooltip: Reward for the Win - Two same Emotes seperated from each other

rewardTwoSame.label: Reward multiplier - Two Emotes
rewardTwoSame.tooltip: Reward for the Win - Two same Emotes next to each other

rewardJackpot.label: Reward multiplier - Three Emotes
rewardJackpot.tooltip: Reward for the Win - Jackpot (3 same)

rewardSuperJackpot.label: Reward multiplier - Three Superjackpot Emotes
rewardSuperJackpot.tooltip: Reward for the Win - 3 SuperJackpot Emotes

onCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on cooldown for $cd seconds!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining

onUserCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on user cooldown for $cd seconds!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining

responseNotEnoughPoints.value: $user you have only $points $currency to pull the lever.
responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user loses.
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes
 $user = Username
 $reward = Points he earned
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play

responseLost.value: $user pulls the lever [$slots] and looses $cost $currency LUL
responseLost.label: No Combination - Lost
responseLost.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user loses.
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes
 $user = Username
 $reward = Points he earned
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play

responseWonSmall.value: $user pulls the lever [ $slots ] and wins (x$multiplier) $reward $currency! PogChamp
responseWonSmall.label: Combination - Two Emotes (seperated)
responseWonSmall.tooltip:
Message that will be posted with 2 Emotes but seperated (e.g.: X O X).
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes
 $user = Username
 $reward = Points he earned
 $multiplier = Multiplier number
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play

responseWon.value: $user pulls the lever [$slots] and wins (x$multiplier) $reward $currency! Kreygasm
responseWon.label: Combination - Two Emotes
responseWon.tooltip:
Message that will be posted with 2 Emotes together (e.g.: X X O).
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes
 $user = Username
 $reward = Points he earned
 $multiplier = Multiplier number
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play

responseJackpot.label: Combination - Three Emotes
responseJackpot.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when he has 3 same Emotes.
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes
 $user = Username
 $reward = Points he earned
 $multiplier = Multiplier number
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play

responseSuperJackpot.value: $user pulls the lever [$slots] SUPER JACKPOT (x$multiplier) $reward $currency! KappaPride
responseSuperJackpot.label: Combination - Three Superjackpot Emotes
responseSuperJackpot.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when he has 3 super Emotes.
 $slots = 3 Rolled Emotes
 $user = Username
 $reward = Points he earned
 $multiplier = Multiplier number
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play
